May 22, 2003

Fatherland Security System Useless for anything other than scaring the nation

Looks like the Department of Homeland Defense’s color-coding scheme to alert the nation to danger from terrorist attacks is reactive rather than predictive. According to this chart, it has gone to “High” only after major terrorist attacks, never before… Which seems to support my theory that its main purpose is to scare the nation into submission...
